item.title: Why am I blogging?
item.description: So why am I starting a blog? And what is it going to be about? These are great questions, and hopefully this post will act as a launching pad for the content that will eventually be found here. Instead of having a long rant up front, I’m going to answer a bunch of questions you may have and you can easily skip sections if they are uninteresting. Who the heck are you?
